en: Use the W,A,S,D keys or controller to follow the path and head to the right.
Move to the top of the screen to go to the next room.

Welcome to


  Wishlair





 Use W.A.S.D


     or a


   controller


    to move.





   Head north

After months of


   absence,




 your father



       sends


  for you to find


     him...






...in Wishlair
